shopify.shopify-page.shop-not-configured-descrip: Your Shopify integration is not setup properly yet. Please connect your shop and generate the storefront API key. You can do this by going to shopify settings page or by
shopify.shopify-settings-page.error-shop: We can't reach the shop. Please check your store URL and Storefront access token.'
shopify.shopify-settings-page.connect-shop-descr: Connect your shop with Shoutem Shopify app. This needs to be done one time per shop.
shopify.shopify-settings-page.api-key-create-des: StoreFront API key used to fetch data from your store, into the mobile app. You need to connect your shop before being able to create or recreate this key.
